1. What's the Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price today?

Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price was Rs 626.50 at 09:18 AM IST on 28th Aug 2024 . Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price was up by 0.02 % over the previous closing price of Rs 626.65 . Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price trend:

Last 1 Month: Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price moved down by 5.92 % on BSE

Last 3 Months: Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price moved down by 8.40 % on BSE

Last 12 Months: Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd share price moved down by 11.57 % on BSE

Last 3 Years: Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd price moved up by 285.48 % on BSE

The stock's PE is 26.41

3. What is the market cap of Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd ?

Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd has a market capitalisation of Rs 3,861 crore.

4. What is Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd 's 52-week high/low share price?

The Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd ’s 52-week high share price is Rs 825.85 and 52-week low share price is Rs 599.45 .

5. Is the Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd profitable?

On a consolidated basis, Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd reported a profit of Rs 25.31 crore on a total income of Rs 162.05 crore for the quarter ended 2024 . For the year ended Jun 2024 , Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd had posted a profit of Rs 25.21 crore on a total income of Rs 162.05 crore.

6. Which are Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd ’s peers in the Industrials sector?

Kewal Kiran Clothing Ltd ’s top 5 peers in the Industrials sector are K P R Mill Ltd, Vedant Fashions, Gokaldas Exports, Kewal Kir.Cloth., Dollar Industrie, Rupa & Co, Kitex Garments .
